title: 2D Triangle Mesh Generation Library
description: Created a lightweight library that generates 2D triangle meshes for user defined isosurfaces in C++. Includes various options for triangle tiling arrangements, including an all-acute adaptation. Provides option for manual specification of desired triangle side lengths in custom regions of isosurface.

title: Raytracer
description: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Vivamus tempus vitae nisi nec interdum. Nunc eget mi facilisis, ullamcorper nunc malesuada, vehicula eros.

title: Image Filters
description: Used OpenCV to create various photo filters in C++. Employed quadtree to organize image attributes spatially, and applied geometric tiling techniques to produce desired aesthetic results.

title: WLP4 Compiler
description: Created a compiler including lexical analysis, syntactical analysis, semantic analysis, and code generation for the programming language WLP4, a strict subset of C++.

title: Battleship
description: Implemented the classic game of Battleship as a JavaFX application in Kotlin, employing MVC architechture to support gameplay.

title: RAAXIS
description: Designed and built a 2-player adaptation of Tetris. Programmed game and embedded logic in C++, optimizing memory usage to remain within the constraints of the Arduino Uno. Coordinated hardware to facilitate tactile gameplay.
